Name: Stela fragment
Description: A fragment of a large round-topped stela of limestone, unpainted. The deceased, Ra'ia, is shown on the left, adoring Osiris and a falcon-headed god, either Horus or Re-Harakhty, and Hathor to the right. Between them are offerings and a stand with a jar on it, being cooled by a lotus blossom. Beneath this scene are 12 remaining vertical columns of text, giving the names of the deceased and of family members.At the bottom of the stela are the heads of a men and two women, facing right.
